scenario: The article suggests investing $100,000 in a diversified portfolio to potentially gain in 2025 and beyond. The allocation is as follows: $20,000 in technology stocks, including AI chip leader Nvidia, Amazon, and Meta Platforms; $20,000 in an S&P 500 index fund, such as the Vanguard S&P 500 ETF (VOO); $20,000 in individual stocks and ETFs across industries and styles; $20,000 in dividend stocks, such as Coca-Cola and Johnson & Johnson; and $20,000 as an opportunity fund. The article emphasizes the importance of diversification, long-term investing, and having an emergency fund in place. Key players mentioned include Nvidia, Amazon, Meta Platforms, Coca-Cola, and Johnson & Johnson.
